name: Bleep Button
description:
What the BLEEP! Do you wish you could bleep-out all the foul words that come out of your dirty mouth? Now you can - with the Bleep Button!

Bleep Button also features information on the 200 films that contain the MOST F$%#-WORDS so that you can help censor them using the Bleep Button!

New: Now beeps for as long as you hold down the button!
